description.en:
Reika Fujisaki is the section chief of a confectionary company. The secret that this capable and extremely beautiful woman hides is that for all 32 years of her life, she's never had a boyfriend and is still a virgin. "I’m happy with this, so this will be enough for me", or so Chief Fujisaki thought, until she's approached by her talented subordinate with a great eye for detail, Hasegawa!! And he also has a secret of his own...?!

From the big-hit series, "You are Permanently Appointed, Please!", comes Kanae Sato, presenting an in-office romance between two overly-pure adults in a confectionary company!
